mapper.sql: id, user_id, entity_type, entity_id, entity_user_id, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: UPDATE `like` SET status = #{status}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND entity_type = #{entityType} AND entity_id = #{entityId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `like` WHERE entity_type = #{entityType} AND entity_id = #{entityId} AND status = 1
